# Perfect Project

[![CI](https://github.com/example/perfect-repo/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/example/perfect-repo/actions)

A comprehensive example project with all best practices.

## Installation

```bash
npm install perfect-project
```

## Usage

```javascript
import { perfectFunction } from 'perfect-project';

const result = perfectFunction();
console.log(result);
```

## API Reference

See our [API documentation](https://example.com/docs).
